articles.author: Boureima Balima, Felix Onuah
articles.title: West Africa's ultimatum to Niger coup leaders nears deadline - Reuters
articles.description: West African nations were to determine on Friday an intervention plan if Niger's coup is not overturned by the weekend after mediation failed in a crisis troubling global powers.
articles.content: NIAMEY/ABUJA, Aug 4 (Reuters) - West African nations were to determine on Friday an intervention plan if Niger's coup is not overturned by the weekend after mediation failed in a crisis troubling glo… [+4322 chars]

articles.title: Florida effectively bans AP Psychology for gender, sex content: College Board - ABC News
articles.description: Florida also rejected an AP African American studies course.
